query:
UPDATE scratch
                SET
                    payload_type = $2,
                    payload      = $3,
                    updated_at   = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
                WHERE id = $1
                RETURNING
                    id              as "id!: Uuid",
                    payload_type,
                    payload,
                    created_at      as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                    updated_at      as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
